function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exportation of parasites to other locations","Impact":"Spread of malaria to new areas","Mitigation":"Developing travel restrictions and monitoring of movement patterns","Technologies":"GIS mapping and mobile phone tracking","People":"Local populations at risk in non-receptive areas","Owner":"Local health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of cross-border movement rate quantification","Impact":"Inability to track and control cross-border disease spread","Mitigation":"Improving data collection methods for cross-border movement","Technologies":"Cross-border data sharing and collaboration","People":"Cross-border communities and neighboring countries","Owner":"Health authorities and international organizations"},{"Description":"Infection importations from neighboring countries","Impact":"Increased transmission of malaria from neighboring countries","Mitigation":"Collaborative surveillance and control measures with neighboring countries","Technologies":"Information sharing platforms and cross-border communication networks","People":"Populations in border regions and neighboring countries","Owner":"International health organizations and government agencies"}]}
